MenuItem.Name: Traditional English Breakfast
MenuItem.Description: The breakfast of champions. 2 Fried eggs, 1 English pork sausage, 1 Back Bacon, 2 pieces of black pudding, baked beans, and 1 slice of fried bread. Served with Brown Sauce

MenuItem.Name: Irish Breakfast
MenuItem.Description: The Irish version of the English breakfast. 2 Fried eggs, 1 Irish pork sausage, 1 rasher, 1 piece of black pudding, 1 piece of white pudding, baked beans, and Irish soda bread.

MenuItem.Name: Ploughman’s Salad
MenuItem.Description: Pork Pie, Pickled Onions, Pickled relish Stilton and Cheddar cheeses and crusty French bread.

MenuItem.Name: Fish and Chips
MenuItem.Description: A smaller portion of our Dinner version

MenuItem.Name: Prawn Cocktail Flavoured Crisps
MenuItem.Description: The classic exotic crisp flavour.

MenuItem.Name: Cheese and Onion Flavoured Crisps
MenuItem.Description: Mum's favourite.

MenuItem.Name: Chip Butty
MenuItem.Description: A soft white roll, slathered with butter and filled with Chips fresh out of the fryer

MenuItem.Name: Cracklin
MenuItem.Description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

MenuItem.Name: Mashed Potatoes
MenuItem.Description: Hand Mashed potatoes

MenuItem.Name: Swede
MenuItem.Description: Hand Mashed Swede

MenuItem.Name: Sausage Roll
MenuItem.Description: English sausage meat wrapped in a flakey pastry. Served with Brown Sauce

MenuItem.Name: Scotch Egg
MenuItem.Description: A hard-boiled egg, wrapped in pork sausage meat. Covered in breadcrumbs and deep-fried. Served cold with a side of picked relish.

MenuItem.Name: Pickled Onions
MenuItem.Description: Golf ball sized onions pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

MenuItem.Name: Pickled Eggs
MenuItem.Description: Large hard-boiled eggs pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

MenuItem.Name: Steak and Kidney Pie
MenuItem.Description: Tender cubes of steak, with tender lamb kidney is succulent rich gravy. Served with a side of mashed potatoes and peas.

MenuItem.Name: Toad in the Hole
MenuItem.Description: Plump British Pork sausages backed in a light batter. Served with mixed vegetables and a brown onion gravy.

MenuItem.Name: Fish and Chips
MenuItem.Description: A large piece of Cod in a covered in a light crisp batter, recipe is a family secret, with a side of Chips and Mushy Peas. Scraps available by request at no extra charge.

MenuItem.Name: Lancashire Hotpot
MenuItem.Description: The famous English Lamb and Mutton stew. Tender succulent pieces of Lamb and Mutton topped with sliced potatoes, slow roasted in the oven.

MenuItem.Name: Faggots
MenuItem.Description: Succulent meatballs made from ground pig's heart, livers and pork belly. Served with a brown gravy mashed potatoes and peas

MenuItem.Name: Chicken Tikka Masala
MenuItem.Description: Britain new national dish. Chunks of roasted chicken in a mildly spicy Masala sauce. Served with Basmati rice

MenuItem.Name: Spotted Dick
MenuItem.Description: The Classic Desert. Steamed suet pudding with currents covered in custard

MenuItem.Name: Eton Mess
MenuItem.Description: Favourite of the old Boys. A mixture of strawberries, pieces of meringue and cream. Old school tie not included!

MenuItem.Name: Jam Roly-Poly
MenuItem.Description: Strawberry Jam rolled up in a suet pudding. Served with Custard
